Articles.Content:
29 minutes ago, AtomicTech said:

Warning: Excessive Hype Below, Moderators Beware.

  Hide contents



 

LOL , so we crossed the mark  , T+19 minutes , any news ?

The best part of not having a release date, is that you always can imagine that the game will be releasing tomorrow.

But when you have an actual date and you have to wait for it... then it becomes agonizing. /S

Edited February 18, 2022 by DunaManiac
What time do they normally release the show and tells in Washington standard time
T+52 minutes on release , i think there will be nothing today .
Everyone start scanning the ksp community for anything, dev diary’s, show and tell, ksp YouTube, feature vids, EVERTHING
nothing in the past hour .

You know the show and tells are supposed to be posted in 2 minutes, not an hour ago. 

They release at 5 pm GMT, whatever time that is for you.

Just now, t_v said:

You know the show and tells are supposed to be posted in 2 minutes, not an hour ago. 

I say no activity on ksp 2 except us in the forum , just silence.
But there was supposed to be a show and tell last week, and they haven’t been known to shift their schedule by a week.

Just now, t_v said:

But there was supposed to be a show and tell last week, and they haven’t been known to shift their schedule by a week. 

It was " supposed " .....

If they're still silent , something big is happening , Nate said this .

4 minutes ago, mmamh2008 said:

If they're still silent , something big is happening , Nate said this .

Doubt it, when did he say that?

Just now, gussi111 said:

Doubt it, when did he say that?

I'll take some time , you even commented on him , wait until I find it ( If I found it )

13 hours ago, gussi111 said:

Doubt it, when did he say that?

Here you go . I thought it was a thread but it was just a comment.

Edited February 19, 2022 by mmamh2008
Yeah he just said if they don't post anything they are busy, not that something big is coming.
I wonder if it's time to start wondering when the next Feature Video will be. I don't remember who it was now, someone on the forums pointed out how there's a private video on KSP's youtube channel.

1 minute ago, Ahres said:

I wonder if it's time to start wondering when the next Feature Video will be. I don't remember who it was now, someone on the forums pointed out how there's a private video on KSP's youtube channel.

Hmm, interesting! I think based on past Feature Video release patterns, the next one should be in March or April, which is getting pretty close. That post also suggests that Video #6 would come out (if a sixth video comes out) in the fall, which could fit in nicely to a final marketing push.

1 hour ago, TheOrbitalMechanic said:

Hmm, interesting! I think based on past Feature Video release patterns, the next one should be in March or April, which is getting pretty close. That post also suggests that Video #6 would come out (if a sixth video comes out) in the fall, which could fit in nicely to a final marketing push.

I was one of the first to point out the Feature Videos were coming out every 5-6 months, and then @Thundy made that really handy graphic to show it better. I have to critique my own observation though. Just because they've been coming out every 5-6 months doesn't mean they'll continue to do so. I hope that as game release gets closer maybe the time between video releases decreases. Although, according to Episode 1.5, there's only one more episode coming and it's about colonies. So stoked for that one. 

Even with all that said, Intercept could've decided to add more topics to do Feature Videos on - particularly multiplayer.

37 minutes ago, Ahres said:

Intercept could've decided to add more topics to do Feature Videos on - particularly multiplayer.

As I pointed out in a comment on the feature video release pattern thread, they will make a video about multiplayer.
Do they post feature videos on fridays like they do with snow and tell's or do they randomly post it every 5 or 6 months regardless of the day of the week?

8 minutes ago, Thundy said:

As I pointed out in a comment on the feature video release pattern thread, they will make a video about multiplayer.

I noticed this after I already commented. Good catch @Thundy, I'm not sure I ever realized Nate had said that.

3 minutes ago, gussi111 said:

Do they post feature videos on fridays like they do with snow and tell's or do they randomly post it every 5 or 6 months regardless of the day of the week?

If you take the time to go back and look I'm sure you'd find the answer. I do remember Episodes 3 and 4 came out on Fridays.

Seriously... I'm bored of other games.

Release early access for PC on STEAM to give yourselves time to unfug the console port.
On the official Instagram account you can find a story that show they are working on a new show and tell video!!!

See? I spent whole day without even thinking that something may or may not appear here. Too busy fighting machines. too busy to even think that I'm hungry and should eat but nevermind that.

16 hours ago, DunaManiac said:

But when you have an actual date and you have to wait for it... then it becomes agonizing.

No you're right, the last week was the longest in human history.

On the official Instagram account you can find a story that show they are working on a new show and tell video!!!

I didn't find it .
